TopicTitle: KSP nominated for Best Sci-Fi Game - Voting now open

Articles.Content:
Just came across this:

http://www.game-debate.com/awards/2013

Registration isn't required.
But doesn't KSP use existing parts?(Nuclear is debatable)

well.. it is about science.

and they have a healthy economy with unlimited funds, so its fiction too
Done and done
Voted, and nice to see KSP out ahead right now
This is not a game!! This is RL.
We're leading!
There are green aliens and you question if is sci-fi?

Voted, and as of 10:22 EST we appear to be in the lead!

Although, I wouldn't quite classify KSP as "sci-fi" in my opinion, it's really more of a "science" game or something, it's just not quite sci-fi enough for me to call it a sci-fi game. But whatever, voted!

has anyone noticed that when you click the trailer button at the review page http://www.game-debate.com/awards/2013/nominee/kerbal-space-program you get a fifa 2010 trailer instead of the one for ksp? (trailer link http://www.game-debate.com/games/index.php?g_id=&trailers=Kerbal%20Space%20Program)
In my opinion, KSP is not only the best Sci-Fi Game
Near-future sci-fi is still sci-fi. The kerbals are entirely capable of putting manned missions on every solid body in their solar system.

But doesn't KSP use existing parts?(Nuclear is debatable)

Actually, no. None of the parts are sized or balanced like any real part. Also: we don't have any yellow fuel lines (actually, no fuel lines at all). With current technology, this would be far too dangerous.
I don't think KSP is much a sci-fi game. It's closer to general fantasy imo.

KSP has Science now. And it has Jebediah, and never in the real world has anyone as crazy, loopy, awesome and badass at the same time existed, so its also fiction .

Voted ^-^
Voted... surprised KSP wasn't in the indie category. Strange.
Thanks to all KSP voters
Keep voting guys. KSP is head to head with The Swapper whatever that is. Eve online is just behind.
i think ksp should be under sim. i know that it isn't a complete sim like x-pane or orbiter, but its closer to that than no-aerodynamics warthunder.
Thanks for the info, I voted.
Voted! KSP is still leading...

Voted.

X Rebirth is there in the sci-fi category too. It's not even out yet, is it?

Voted.

X Rebirth is there in the sci-fi category too. It's not even out yet, is it?

Available Nov 15th, at least on STEAM
Not sure if KSP really fits into 'Sci-fi', at least not the way its described on the poll. Then again, where else would it go? Don't care either way - my vote is in!

Not sure if KSP really fits into 'Sci-fi', at least not the way its described on the poll. Then again, where else would it go? Don't care either way - my vote is in!

Simulators...

EDIT:Point taken on the fuel lines near future is still future.
